snippet: Numerology is always a factor in assessing military-political events of import in North Korea, and an upcoming rocket launching could well be set for Dec. 17, a date that would mark the first anniversary of the death of the longtime dictator Kim...
abstract: Numerology is always a factor in assessing military-political events of import in North Korea, and an upcoming rocket launching could well be set for Dec. 17, a date that would mark the first anniversary of the death of the longtime dictator Kim Jong-il.

headline.main: Symbolism and Numerology in North Korean Rocketry
